name: storm-replay
description: Archived NEXRAD weather radar replay tool for storm chasers
author: Christopher Manzeck

scripts.electron:dev: tsc -p electron/tsconfig.json && cp electron/preload.cjs dist-electron/ && concurrently -n vite,electron "vite" "wait-on tcp:5173 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron ."
scripts.electron:preview: vite build && tsc -p electron/tsconfig.json && cp electron/preload.cjs dist-electron/ && electron .
scripts.dist:dir: vite build && tsc -p electron/tsconfig.json && cp electron/preload.cjs dist-electron/ && electron-builder --dir
scripts.dist:dmg: vite build && tsc -p electron/tsconfig.json && cp electron/preload.cjs dist-electron/ && electron-builder
